pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Measures for windows and doors

content.raw:
The measurement text is sometimes upside-down when I preview a door or window:

![hitl_pr_1322.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/4167626971-hitl_pr_1322.png)

![hitl_1322_2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3895994641-hitl_1322_2.png)

It appears to happen when a wall is drawn from right to left (that is, the starting point is on the right side).
content.html:
The measurement text is sometimes upside-down when I preview a door or window:

It appears to happen when a wall is drawn from right to left (that is, the starting point is on the right side).
